title: Megalithic Structures - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 8/16/18
itunes:title: Megalithic Structures - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 8/16/18
description:
George Noory and archaeology expert Glenn Kreisberg explore ancient ceremonial stone structures discovered in New England, and whether they could be connected to Stonehenge or other formations found around the planet.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
